tool_description: Calculates shipping costs and transit times across multiple carriers based on package specifications and destination details.

destination_country.description: Two-letter ISO country code for destination

declared_value.description: Declared value of contents in USD

service_types.description: Preferred service types (ground, express, overnight, international)

error_messages: Invalid package dimensions: All dimensions must be positive numbers greater than 0.
Invalid postal codes: Provide valid postal codes for origin and destination.
Package too large: Package exceeds maximum size limits for available carriers.
Package too heavy: Package exceeds weight limits for selected service types.
No service available: No shipping services available for the specified route and package specifications.
usage: Provide origin and destination postal codes, country code, and complete package dimensions. Optionally specify declared_value, service_types, and preferred carriers. Returns rate comparison across carriers and services.

shipping_options.description: Array of shipping option descriptions with carrier, service, cost, and transit time

currency.description: Currency code for pricing (USD, CAD, etc.)
